title: ‘हेलीकॉप्टर किसान’ हेमा मालिनी? गलत दावे के साथ 2014 और 2015 की तस्वीरें शेयर
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Began my Lok Sabha campaign today with the Govardhan Kshetra where I had the opportunity to interact with women working in the fields. A few fotos for u of my first day of campaign pic.twitter.com/EH7vYm8Peu
